import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' function TaskItem(props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const onSubmit = () => { console.log(this.state.val); }; return (
{props.task.title} {props.task.state}

{props.task.body}

this.setState({ val: e.target.value })} />
) } export default TaskItem
